00052         CdcSD::CdcSD(G4String name, MyVGeometryParameter* pointer)
00053 :MySD(name, pointer), hitsCollection(0)
00054 {
00055         m_GeometryParameter= dynamic_cast<CdcGeometryParameter*> (pointer);
00056         if (!m_GeometryParameter){
00057                 //              std::cout<<"In CdcSD::CdcSD, cannot get CdcGeometryParameter pointer!!!"<<std::endl;
00058                 G4Exception("CdcSD::CdcSD()",
00059                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00060                                 "cannot get CdcGeometryParameter pointer");
00061         }
00062 
00063         //name of related Digiteizer module
00064         //  CdcDigitizer* cdcDM = new CdcDigitizer("CdcDigitizer");
00065         //      MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->RegistorDM("CdcDigitizer");
00066         //  G4DigiManager::GetDMpointer()->AddNewModule(cdcDM);
00067 
00068         //define fTolerance
00069         fTolerance = 2.2E-6;
00070 }

00075 //-----------------------------------Initialize----------------------------------------------
00076 //Will be called by geant4 automatically at the beginning of each event
00077 void CdcSD::Initialize(G4HCofThisEvent* HCE)
00078 {
00079         hitsCollection = new CdcHitsCollection
00080                 (SensitiveDetectorName,collectionName[0]);
00081         std::cout<<"====>In CdcSD::Initialize(), created hitsCollection at ("<<(void*)hitsCollection<<std::endl;
00082         G4int HCID = -1;
00083         HCID = G4SDManager::GetSDMpointer()->GetCollectionID(collectionName[0]);
00084         if ( HCID < 0 ){
00085                 G4Exception("CdcSD::Initialize()",
00086                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00087                                 "Cann not find hitsCollection of this event");
00088         }
00089         HCE->AddHitsCollection( HCID, hitsCollection );
00090         int LayerNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_LayerNo();
00091         hitPointer.resize(LayerNo);
00092         for( int  i = 0; i < LayerNo; i++ ){
00093                 int CellNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_num(i);
00094                 hitPointer[i].resize(CellNo);
00095                 for( int j = 0; j < CellNo; j++ ){
00096                         hitPointer[i][j] = -1;
00097                 }
00098         }
00099         //initialize for root objects
00100         cdc_nHits = 0;
00101         m_x.clear();
00102         m_y.clear();
00103         m_z.clear();
00104         m_pIx.clear();
00105         m_pIy.clear();
00106         m_pIz.clear();
00107         m_pOx.clear();
00108         m_pOy.clear();
00109         m_pOz.clear();
00110         m_t.clear();
00111         m_px.clear();
00112         m_py.clear();
00113         m_pz.clear();
00114         m_e.clear();
00115         m_ekin.clear();
00116         m_edep.clear();
00117         m_stepL.clear();
00118         m_nTry.clear();
00119         m_status.clear();
00120         m_error.clear();
00121         m_driftD_smeared.clear();
00122         m_driftD.clear();
00123         m_layerID.clear();
00124         m_cellID.clear();
00125         m_tid.clear();
00126         m_pid.clear();
00127         m_particleName.clear();
00128         m_ppid.clear();
00129         m_ptid.clear();
00130         m_oprocess.clear();
00131         m_ovolName.clear();
00132         //initialize for filter
00133         nTracks = 0;
00134         prevTrackID = -100;
00135 }

00137 //-----------------------------------SetBranch----------------------------------------------
00138 //Should be called at the beginning of each run (now in MyAnalysisSvc::BeginOfRunAction())
00139 void CdcSD::SetBranch(){
00140         MyRoot* myRoot = MyRoot::GetMyRoot();
00141         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00142         if( flag_nHits ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_nHits", &cdc_nHits);
00143         if( flag_x ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_x", &m_x);
00144         if( flag_y ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_y", &m_y);
00145         if( flag_z ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_z", &m_z);
00146         if( flag_pIx ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pIx", &m_pIx);
00147         if( flag_pIy ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pIy", &m_pIy);
00148         if( flag_pIz ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pIz", &m_pIz);
00149         if( flag_pOx ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pOx", &m_pOx);
00150         if( flag_pOy ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pOy", &m_pOy);
00151         if( flag_pOz ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pOz", &m_pOz);
00152         if( flag_t ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_t", &m_t);
00153         if( flag_px ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_px", &m_px);
00154         if( flag_py ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_py", &m_py);
00155         if( flag_pz ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pz", &m_pz);
00156         if( flag_e ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_e", &m_e);
00157         if( flag_ekin ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_ekin", &m_ekin);
00158         if( flag_edep ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_edep", &m_edep);
00159         if( flag_stepL ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_stepL", &m_stepL);
00160         if( flag_nTry ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_nTry", &m_nTry);
00161         if( flag_status ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_status", &m_status);
00162         if( flag_error ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_error", &m_error);
00163         if( flag_driftD_smeared ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_driftD_smeared", &m_driftD_smeared);
00164         if( flag_driftD ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_driftD", &m_driftD);
00165         if( flag_layerID ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_layerID", &m_layerID);
00166         if( flag_cellID ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_cellID", &m_cellID);
00167         if( flag_tid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_tid", &m_tid);
00168         if( flag_pid ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_pid", &m_pid);
00169         if( flag_particleName ) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_particleName", &m_particleName);
00170         if( flag_ppid) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_ppid", &m_ppid);
00171         if( flag_ptid) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_ptid", &m_ptid);
00172         if( flag_oprocess) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_oprocess", &m_oprocess);
00173         if( flag_ovolName) myRoot->SetBranch(volName+"_ovolName", &m_ovolName);
00174 }

00176 //-----------------------------------ReadOutputCard----------------------------------------------
00177 //Should be called before the begin of each run (now in the constructor of MyAnalysisSvc)
00178 void CdcSD::ReadOutputCard(G4String filename){
00179         ReSet();
00180         G4String volName = get_VolName();
00181         std::ifstream fin_card(filename);
00182         if(!fin_card){
00183                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, cannot open "<<filename<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00184                 G4Exception("CdcSD::ReadOutputCard()",
00185                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00186                                 "cannot find output card");
00187         }
00188         std::stringstream buf_card;
00189         std::string s_card;
00190         int n_output_section_symbol = 0;
00191         int n_filter_section_symbol = 0;
00192         G4String BRANCHSECTIONNAME = volName + "_SECTION";
00193         G4String FILTERSECTIONNAME = volName + "_FILTERSECTION";
00194         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00195                 buf_card.str("");
00196                 buf_card.clear();
00197                 buf_card<<s_card;
00198 
00199                 //eleminate useless lines
00200                 const char* c_card = s_card.c_str();
00201                 int length = strlen(c_card);
00202                 int offset = 0;
00203                 for ( ; offset < length; offset++ ){
00204                         if ( c_card[offset] != ' ' ) break;
00205                 }
00206                 if ( c_card[offset] == '#' || (c_card[offset] == '/' && c_card[offset+1] == '/') || length - offset == 0 ){
00207                         continue;
00208                 }
00209 
00210                 std::string name;
00211                 buf_card>>name;
00212                 if ( n_output_section_symbol == 0 ){
00213                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00214                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00215                         }
00216                 }
00217                 else if ( n_output_section_symbol == 1 ){
00218                         if ( name == BRANCHSECTIONNAME ){
00219                                 n_output_section_symbol++;
00220                         }
00221                         else if( name == "nHits" ) flag_nHits = true;
00222                         else if( name == "x" ) {flag_x = true; buf_card>>unitName_x; unit_x = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_x);}
00223                         else if( name == "y" ) {flag_y = true; buf_card>>unitName_y; unit_y = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_y);}
00224                         else if( name == "z" ) {flag_z = true; buf_card>>unitName_z; unit_z = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_z);}
00225                         else if( name == "pIx" ) {flag_pIx = true; buf_card>>unitName_pIx; unit_pIx = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pIx);}
00226                         else if( name == "pIy" ) {flag_pIy = true; buf_card>>unitName_pIy; unit_pIy = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pIy);}
00227                         else if( name == "pIz" ) {flag_pIz = true; buf_card>>unitName_pIz; unit_pIz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pIz);}
00228                         else if( name == "pOx" ) {flag_pOx = true; buf_card>>unitName_pOx; unit_pOx = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOx);}
00229                         else if( name == "pOy" ) {flag_pOy = true; buf_card>>unitName_pOy; unit_pOy = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOy);}
00230                         else if( name == "pOz" ) {flag_pOz = true; buf_card>>unitName_pOz; unit_pOz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOz);}
00231                         else if( name == "t" ) {flag_t = true; buf_card>>unitName_t; unit_t = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_t);}
00232                         else if( name == "px" ) {flag_px = true; buf_card>>unitName_px; unit_px = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_px);}
00233                         else if( name == "py" ) {flag_py = true; buf_card>>unitName_py; unit_py = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_py);}
00234                         else if( name == "pz" ) {flag_pz = true; buf_card>>unitName_pz; unit_pz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pz);}
00235                         else if( name == "ekin" ) {{flag_ekin = true; buf_card>>unitName_ekin; unit_ekin = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_ekin);}}
00236                         else if( name == "e" ) {flag_e = true; buf_card>>unitName_e; unit_e = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_e);}
00237                         else if( name == "edep" ) {flag_edep = true; buf_card>>unitName_edep; unit_edep = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_edep);}
00238                         else if( name == "stepL" ) {{flag_stepL = true; buf_card>>unitName_stepL; unit_stepL = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_stepL);}}
00239                         else if( name == "nTry" ) {flag_nTry = true;}
00240                         else if( name == "status" ) {flag_status = true;}
00241                         else if( name == "error" ) {flag_error = true;}
00242                         else if( name == "driftD_smeared" ) {flag_driftD_smeared = true; buf_card>>unitName_driftD_smeared; unit_driftD_smeared = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_driftD_smeared);}
00243                         else if( name == "driftD" ) {flag_driftD = true; buf_card>>unitName_driftD; unit_driftD = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_driftD);}
00244                         else if( name == "cellID" ) flag_cellID = true;
00245                         else if( name == "layerID" ) flag_layerID = true;
00246                         else if( name == "tid" ) flag_tid = true;
00247                         else if( name == "pid" ) flag_pid = true;
00248                         else if( name == "ppid" ) {flag_ppid = true;}
00249                         else if( name == "ptid" ) {flag_ptid = true;}
00250                         else if( name == "oprocess" ) {flag_oprocess = true;}
00251                         else if( name == "ovolName" ) {flag_ovolName = true;}
00252                         else if( name == "particleName" ) flag_particleName = true;
00253                         else{
00254                                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00255                                 std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00256                         }
00257                 }
00258 
00259                 if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 0 ){
00260                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00261                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00262                         }
00263                 }
00264                 else if ( n_filter_section_symbol == 1 ){
00265                         if ( name == FILTERSECTIONNAME ){
00266                                 n_filter_section_symbol++;
00267                         }
00268                         else if( name == "Switch" ) Switch = true;
00269                         else if( name == "neutralCut" ) neutralCut = true;
00270                         else if( name == "maxn" ) buf_card>>maxn;
00271                         else if( name == "ntracks" ) buf_card>>ntracks;
00272                         else{
00273                                 G4double para;
00274                                 std::string unit;
00275                                 buf_card>>para>>unit;
00276                                 para *= MyString2Anything::get_U(unit);
00277                                 if( name == "minp" ) minp = para;
00278                                 else if ( name == "minedep" ) minedep = para;
00279                                 else if( name == "mint" ) mint = para;
00280                                 else if( name == "maxt" ) maxt = para;
00281                                 else{
00282                                         std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00283                                         std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00284                                 }
00285                         }
00286                 }
00287 
00288                 if ( n_output_section_symbol > 1 && n_filter_section_symbol > 1 ){
00289                         break;
00290                 }
00291         }
00292         buf_card.str("");
00293         buf_card.clear();
00294         if ( n_output_section_symbol <= 1 ){
00295                 std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00296                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators for output in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00297                 std::cout<<"Seperator: "<<BRANCHSECTIONNAME<<std::endl;
00298                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00299                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00300         }
00301         if ( n_filter_section_symbol<= 1 ){
00302                 std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00303                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators for filter in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00304                 std::cout<<"Seperator: "<<FILTERSECTIONNAME<<std::endl;
00305                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00306                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00307         }
00308         fin_card.close();
00309         ShowOutCard();
00310 }

00313 //Private
00314 void CdcSD::ReSet(){
00315         //default output set
00316         flag_nHits = false;
00317         flag_x = false;
00318         flag_y = false;
00319         flag_z = false;
00320         flag_pIx = false;
00321         flag_pIy = false;
00322         flag_pIz = false;
00323         flag_pOx = false;
00324         flag_pOy = false;
00325         flag_pOz = false;
00326         flag_t = false;
00327         flag_px = false;
00328         flag_py = false;
00329         flag_pz = false;
00330         flag_e = false;
00331         flag_ekin = false;
00332         flag_edep = false;
00333         flag_stepL = false;
00334         flag_nTry = false;
00335         flag_status = false;
00336         flag_error = false;
00337         flag_driftD = false;
00338         flag_driftD_smeared = false;
00339         flag_cellID = false;
00340         flag_layerID = false;
00341         flag_tid = false;
00342         flag_pid = false;
00343         flag_particleName = false;
00344         flag_ppid = false;
00345         flag_ptid = false;
00346         flag_oprocess = false;
00347         flag_ovolName = false;
00348         //for fileter
00349         Switch = false;
00350         neutralCut = false;
00351         minp = 1.5*MeV;
00352         maxn = 1000;
00353         ntracks = 1;
00354         mint = 0;
00355         maxt = 0;
00356         minedep = 0;
00357         //for units
00358         unitName_pOx = "cm";
00359         unitName_pOy = "cm";
00360         unitName_pOz = "cm";
00361         unitName_pIx = "cm";
00362         unitName_pIy = "cm";
00363         unitName_pIz = "cm";
00364         unitName_x = "cm";
00365         unitName_y = "cm";
00366         unitName_z = "cm";
00367         unitName_t = "ns";
00368         unitName_px = "GeV";
00369         unitName_py = "GeV";
00370         unitName_pz = "GeV";
00371         unitName_ekin = "GeV";
00372         unitName_e = "GeV";
00373         unitName_edep = "GeV";
00374         unitName_stepL = "cm";
00375         unit_pOx = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOx);
00376         unit_pOy = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOy);
00377         unit_pOz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pOz);
00378         unit_pIx = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pIx);
00379         unit_pIy = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pIy);
00380         unit_pIz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pIz);
00381         unit_x = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_x);
00382         unit_y = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_y);
00383         unit_z = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_z);
00384         unit_t = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_t);
00385         unit_px = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_px);
00386         unit_py = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_py);
00387         unit_pz = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_pz);
00388         unit_ekin = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_ekin);
00389         unit_e = MyString2Anything::get_U(unitName_e);

00424         std::cout<<"output tid?    "<<(flag_tid?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00425         std::cout<<"output pid?    "<<(flag_pid?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00426         //for fileter
00427         std::cout<<"Switch on?     "<<(Switch?" yes":" no")<<std::endl;
00428         std::cout<<"neutralCut on? "<<(neutralCut?"yes":"no")<<std::endl;
00429         std::cout<<"minp =         "<<minp/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00430         std::cout<<"maxn =         "<<maxn<<std::endl;
00431         std::cout<<"ntracks =      "<<ntracks<<std::endl;
00432         std::cout<<"mint =         "<<mint/ns<<"ns"<<std::endl;
00433         std::cout<<"maxt =         "<<maxt/ns<<"ns"<<std::endl;
00434         std::cout<<"minedep =      "<<minedep/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00435         std::cout<<"VerboseLevel = "<<get_VerboseLevel()<<std::endl;
00436         std::cout<<"******************************************************************************"<<std::endl;
00437 }
00438 
00439 //-----------------------------------ProcessHits----------------------------------------------
00440 //Will be called by geant4 automatically everytime a step in CdcSD generated
00441 G4bool CdcSD::ProcessHits(G4Step* aStep,G4TouchableHistory* touchableHistory)
00442 {
00443 
00444         std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ProcessHits()"<<std::endl;
00445         //*************************get useful variables***********************
00446 
00447         int status;
00448         // get track info
00449         G4Track* gTrack = aStep->GetTrack() ;
00450         G4int trackID= gTrack->GetTrackID(); //G4 track ID of current track.
00451         G4double globalT=gTrack->GetGlobalTime();//Time since the event in which the track belongs is created
00452         G4int charge = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGCharge();
00453         G4int pid = gTrack->GetDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00454         G4double theta = gTrack->GetMomentumDirection().theta();
00455 
00456         // get information at the beginning and at the end of step
00457         G4StepPoint* prePoint  = aStep->GetPreStepPoint() ;
00458         G4StepPoint* postPoint = aStep->GetPostStepPoint() ;
00459         G4double total_e = prePoint->GetTotalEnergy();
00460         G4double ekin = prePoint->GetKineticEnergy();
00461         G4ThreeVector pointIn_mom = prePoint->GetMomentum();
00462         G4double pointIn_pa = pointIn_mom.mag();
00463         G4ThreeVector pointIn_pos = prePoint->GetPosition();
00464         G4ThreeVector pointOut_pos = postPoint->GetPosition();
00465         G4double pointIn_time = prePoint->GetGlobalTime();//Time since the event in which the track belongs is created
00466 
00467         // get step info
00468         G4double edep = aStep->GetTotalEnergyDeposit();
00469         G4double stepL = aStep->GetStepLength();
00470 
00471         // get layerId and cellId
00472         const G4VTouchable *touchable = prePoint->GetTouchable();
00473         G4int ReplicaNo = touchable->GetReplicaNumber(0);
00474         G4int layerId, cellId;
00475         status = m_GeometryParameter->get_layerIdcellId(ReplicaNo, &layerId, &cellId);
00476         if(status){
00477                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ProcessHits(), unknown ReplicaNo = "<<ReplicaNo<<"!!! Will not generate hit"<<std::endl;
00478                 return false;
00479         }
00480         G4VPhysicalVolume *phy_vol = touchable->GetVolume(0);
00481         //G4RotationMatrix  rot_mat = phy_vol->GetObjectRotationValue();
00482         //double phiX_touchable = rot_mat.phiX();
00483         //double phiY_touchable = rot_mat.phiY();
00484         //double phiZ_touchable = rot_mat.phiZ();
00485         //std::cout<<"### ("<<layerId
00486         //           <<","<<cellId
00487         //           <<") phiX_touchable = "<<phiX_touchable/deg
00488         //           <<") phiY_touchable = "<<phiY_touchable/deg
00489         //           <<") phiZ_touchable = "<<phiZ_touchable/deg
00490         //           <<"deg, phi = "<<m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_phi(layerId,cellId)/deg
00491         //           <<"deg!"
00492         //           <<std::endl;
00493 
00494         //fieldVal means the field value at pointIn_pos
00495         G4double fieldVal[3];
00496         G4double point[4];
00497         point[0] = pointIn_pos.x();
00498         point[1] = pointIn_pos.y();
00499         point[2] = pointIn_pos.z();
00500         point[3] = pointIn_time;
00501         const G4Field* field = G4TransportationManager::GetTransportationManager()->GetFieldManager()->GetDetectorField();
00502         field->GetFieldValue(point, fieldVal);
00503         G4ThreeVector Bfield(fieldVal[0], fieldVal[1], fieldVal[2]);
00504 
00505         CDCSD_LINEVAR(layerId);
00506         CDCSD_LINEVAR(cellId);
00507         CDCSD_LINEVAR(pointIn_pos.x());
00508         CDCSD_LINEVAR(pointIn_pos.y());
00509         CDCSD_LINEVAR(pointIn_pos.z());
00510         //*************************filter***********************
00511         //switch
00512         if (!Switch) return false;
00513         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00514 
00515         //ntracks
00516         if ( trackID != prevTrackID ){
00517                 prevTrackID = trackID;
00518                 nTracks++;
00519         }
00520         if ( nTracks > ntracks && ntracks) return false;
00521         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00522 
00523         //maxn
00524         if ( maxn && cdc_nHits >= maxn ) return false;
00525         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00526 
00527         //minp
00528         if ( minp && pointIn_pa < minp ) return false;
00529         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00530 
00531         //time_window
00532         if(isnan(globalT)){
00533                 G4cout<<"CdcSD:error, globalT is nan "<<G4endl;
00534                 return false;
00535         }
00536         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00537         if ( globalT < mint && mint ) return false;
00538         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00539         if ( globalT > maxt && maxt ) return false;
00540         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00541 
00542         //neutralCut
00543         if ( charge == 0 && neutralCut ) return false;
00544         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00545 
00546         //edep
00547         if( edep <= minedep ) return false;
00548         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00549 
00550         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00551                 std::cout<<"in layer["<<layerId<<"], the track hit cell["<<cellId<<"]"<<std::endl;
00552         }
00553 
00554         //*************************calculate hitPosition****************************
00555         G4ThreeVector hitPosition(0.,0.,0.);
00556         G4double driftD = 0;
00557         G4double error = 0;
00558         G4int nTry = 0;
00559         status = FindClosestPoint(hitPosition, driftD, pointIn_pos, pointOut_pos, pointIn_mom, Bfield, layerId, cellId, charge, error, nTry);
00560         if (status){
00561                 std::cout<<"In CdcSD::ProcessHits(), cannot find closest point!!! will not generate hit!"<<std::endl;
00562                 return false;
00563         }
00564         double driftD_err = 0.2*mm;
00565         double driftD_smeared;
00566 //      while (1) {
00567 //              driftD_smeared = gRandom->Gaus(driftD, driftD_err);
00568 //              if (driftD_smeared>0) break;
00569 //      }
00570         // TODO: Should move this part to Digitizer
00571         //hitPosition = pointIn_pos;
00572         G4double driftV = 0.025*mm/ns;
00573         G4double driftT = driftD_smeared/driftV+pointIn_time;
00574         CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00575 
00576         //*******************generate or modify hit************************
00577         if (hitPointer[layerId][cellId] == -1){
00578                 CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00579                 CdcHit* newHit = new CdcHit();
00580                 newHit->SetTrackID(trackID);
00581                 newHit->SetLayerNo(layerId);
00582                 newHit->SetCellNo(cellId);
00583                 newHit->SetEdep(edep);
00584                 newHit->SetPos(hitPosition);
00585                 newHit->SetDriftD(driftD);
00586                 newHit->SetTheta(theta);
00587                 newHit->SetPosFlag(0);
00588                 newHit->SetEnterAngle(0);
00589                 newHit->SetDriftT (driftT);
00590                 newHit->SetGlobalT(globalT);
00591                 hitsCollection->insert(newHit);
00592                 G4int NbHits = hitsCollection->entries();
00593                 hitPointer[layerId][cellId]=NbHits-1;
00594                 //Set for root objects
00595                 if(flag_x) m_x.push_back(hitPosition.x()/unit_x);
00596                 if(flag_y) m_y.push_back(hitPosition.y()/unit_y);
00597                 if(flag_z) m_z.push_back(hitPosition.z()/unit_z);
00598                 if(flag_pIx) m_pIx.push_back(pointIn_pos.x()/unit_pIx);
00599                 if(flag_pIy) m_pIy.push_back(pointIn_pos.y()/unit_pIy);
00600                 if(flag_pIz) m_pIz.push_back(pointIn_pos.z()/unit_pIz);
00601                 if(flag_pOx) m_pOx.push_back(pointOut_pos.x()/unit_pOx);
00602                 if(flag_pOy) m_pOy.push_back(pointOut_pos.y()/unit_pOy);
00603                 if(flag_pOz) m_pOz.push_back(pointOut_pos.z()/unit_pOz);
00604                 if(flag_t) m_t.push_back(globalT/unit_t);
00605                 if(flag_px) m_px.push_back(pointIn_mom.x()/unit_px);
00606                 if(flag_py) m_py.push_back(pointIn_mom.y()/unit_py);
00607                 if(flag_pz) m_pz.push_back(pointIn_mom.z()/unit_pz);
00608                 if(flag_ekin) m_ekin.push_back(ekin/unit_ekin);
00609                 if(flag_e) m_e.push_back(total_e/unit_e);
00610                 if(flag_edep) m_edep.push_back(edep/unit_edep);
00611                 if(flag_stepL) m_stepL.push_back(stepL/unit_stepL);
00612                 if(flag_error) m_error.push_back(error);
00613                 if(flag_status) m_status.push_back(status);
00614                 if(flag_nTry) m_nTry.push_back(nTry);
00615                 if(flag_driftD) m_driftD.push_back(driftD/unit_driftD);
00616                 if(flag_driftD_smeared) m_driftD_smeared.push_back(driftD_smeared/unit_driftD_smeared);
00617                 if(flag_layerID) m_layerID.push_back(layerId);
00618                 if(flag_cellID) m_cellID.push_back(cellId);
00619                 if(flag_tid) m_tid.push_back(trackID);
00620                 if(flag_pid) m_pid.push_back(pid);
00621                 cdc_nHits++;
00622         }
00623         else{
00624                 CDCSD_LINEINFO();
00625                 G4int pointer=hitPointer[layerId][cellId];
00626                 G4double edepTemp = (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->GetEdep();
00627                 (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetEdep(edepTemp  + edep);
00628                 if(flag_edep) m_edep[pointer] = (edepTemp + edep)/unit_edep;
00629                 G4double preDriftT = (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->GetDriftT();
00630                 G4double preDriftD = (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->GetDriftD();
00631                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00632                         std::cout<<"  preDriftD = "<<preDriftD/cm
00633                                      <<"cm, curDriftT = "<<preDriftT/ns
00634                                      <<"ns, curDriftD = "<<driftD/cm
00635                                      <<"cm, curDriftT = "<<driftT/ns
00636                                      <<"ns"
00637                                      <<std::endl;
00638                 }
00639 //              if (driftD < preDriftD) {
00640                 if (driftT < preDriftT) {
00641                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00642                                 std::cout<<"    Update Hit!!!"<<std::endl;
00643                         }
00644                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetTrackID(trackID);
00645                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetDriftD(driftD);
00646                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetDriftT(driftT);
00647                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetPos(hitPosition);
00648                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetGlobalT(globalT);
00649                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetTheta(theta);
00650                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetPosFlag(0);
00651                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetEnterAngle(0);
00652                         //Set for root objects
00653                         if(flag_x) m_x[pointer] = hitPosition.x()/unit_x;
00654                         if(flag_y) m_y[pointer] = hitPosition.y()/unit_y;
00655                         if(flag_z) m_z[pointer] = hitPosition.z()/unit_z;
00656                         if(flag_pIx) m_pIx[pointer] = pointIn_pos.x()/unit_pIx;
00657                         if(flag_pIy) m_pIy[pointer] = pointIn_pos.y()/unit_pIy;
00658                         if(flag_pIz) m_pIz[pointer] = pointIn_pos.z()/unit_pIz;
00659                         if(flag_pOx) m_pOx[pointer] = pointOut_pos.x()/unit_pOx;
00660                         if(flag_pOy) m_pOy[pointer] = pointOut_pos.y()/unit_pOy;
00661                         if(flag_pOz) m_pOz[pointer] = pointOut_pos.z()/unit_pOz;
00662                         if(flag_t) m_t[pointer] = globalT/unit_t;
00663                         if(flag_px) m_px[pointer] = pointIn_mom.x()/unit_px;
00664                         if(flag_py) m_py[pointer] = pointIn_mom.y()/unit_py;
00665                         if(flag_pz) m_pz[pointer] = pointIn_mom.z()/unit_pz;
00666                         if(flag_e) m_e[pointer] = total_e/unit_e;
00667                         if(flag_e) m_ekin[pointer] = ekin/unit_ekin;
00668                         if(flag_stepL) m_stepL[pointer] += stepL/unit_stepL;
00669                         if(flag_nTry) m_nTry[pointer] = nTry;
00670                         if(flag_status) m_status[pointer] = status;
00671                         if(flag_error) m_error[pointer] = error;
00672                         if(flag_driftD_smeared) m_driftD_smeared[pointer] = driftD_smeared/unit_driftD_smeared;
00673                         if(flag_driftD) m_driftD[pointer] = driftD/unit_driftD;
00674                         if(flag_layerID) m_layerID[pointer] = layerId;
00675                         if(flag_cellID) m_cellID[pointer] = cellId;
00676                         if(flag_tid) m_tid[pointer] = trackID;
00677                         if(flag_pid) m_pid[pointer] = pid;
00678                 }
00679         }
00680         return true;
00681 }
00682 
00683 //-----------------------------------EndOfEvent----------------------------------------------
00684 //Will be called by geant4 automatically at the end of each event
00685 void CdcSD::EndOfEvent(G4HCofThisEvent*){
00686         if (verboseLevel>0) {
00687                 //    hitsCollection->PrintAllHits();
00688                 /*
00689                    G4int NbHits = hitsCollection->entries();
00690                    G4cout << "\n-------->Hits Collection: in this event they are " << NbHits
00691                    << " hits in the CDC chambers: " << G4endl;
00692                    for (G4int i=0;i<NbHits;i++) (*hitsCollection)[i]->Print();
00693                  */
00694         }
00695 }
00696 
00697 //-----------------------------------FindClosestPoint----------------------------------------------
00698 //private
00699 int CdcSD::FindClosestPoint(G4ThreeVector &closestPoint_pos, double &driftD,
00700                 G4ThreeVector pointIn_pos, G4ThreeVector pointOut_pos, G4ThreeVector pointIn_mom, G4ThreeVector Bfield, int layerId, int cellId, int charge,
00701                 G4double &error_max, G4int &nTry){
00702 
00703         nTry = 0;
00704         error_max = 0;
00705         //Get position of signal wire
00706         G4double wire_pos_R, wire_pos_phi;
00707         G4double alpha = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_angle4rotate(layerId)/2;
00708         wire_pos_R = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_RMid(layerId)*cos(alpha/2);
00709         wire_pos_phi = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_phi(layerId, cellId);
00710         G4ThreeVector wire_pos(1.,1.,1.);
00711         wire_pos.setMag(wire_pos_R);
00712         wire_pos.setTheta(pi/2);
00713         wire_pos.setPhi(wire_pos_phi);//careful with the sign
00714         G4double layer_halfzlen = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_length(layerId)/2.; //In Geant4, soild has central-symmetry 
00715         G4double alpha_RMid = alpha/2;
00716         G4double wire_theta = atan(wire_pos_R*sin(alpha_RMid)/layer_halfzlen);
00717         G4ThreeVector wire_direction(1.,1.,1.);
00718         wire_direction.setMag(1.);
00719         wire_direction.setPhi(wire_pos_phi+ (alpha>0?pi/2:-pi/2));
00720         wire_direction.setTheta(wire_theta);
00721         wire_direction = wire_direction.unit();//r=0? self : unit 
00722 
00723         G4ThreeVector B_direction = Bfield.unit();
00724         G4double B_amplitude = Bfield.mag();
00725         G4double pT = (pointIn_mom.cross(B_direction)).mag();
00726 
00727         G4ThreeVector w2PI = pointIn_pos - wire_pos; // vector from wire(centre) to pointIn
00728         G4double DpI = (w2PI - w2PI.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction ).mag(); // distance form pointIn to wire
00729         G4ThreeVector w2PO = pointOut_pos - wire_pos; // vector from wire(centre) to pointOut
00730         G4double DpO = (w2PO - w2PO.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction ).mag(); // distance form pointOut to wire
00731 
00732         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00733                 std::cout<<"  position of pointIn(rho,phi,z):"<<pointIn_pos.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<pointIn_pos.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<pointIn_pos.z()/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
00734                 std::cout<<"  position of pointOut(rho,phi,z):"<<pointOut_pos.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<pointOut_pos.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<pointOut_pos.z()/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
00735                 std::cout<<"  B(phi, theta, B): "<<B_direction.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<B_direction.theta()/deg<<"deg, "<<B_amplitude/tesla<<"T"<<std::endl;
00736                 std::cout<<"  momentum of pointIn(r,theta,phi):"<<pointIn_mom.mag()/MeV<<"MeV, "<<pointIn_mom.theta()/deg<<"deg, "<<pointIn_mom.phi()/deg<<"deg, pT = "<<pT/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
00737                 std::cout<<"  position of wire(rho,phi,z):"<<wire_pos.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<wire_pos.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<wire_pos.z()/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
00738                 std::cout<<"  direction of wire(theta, phi):"<<wire_direction.theta()/deg<<"deg, "<<wire_direction.phi()/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00739                 std::cout<<"  DpI = "<<DpI/cm<<"cm, DpO = "<<DpO/cm<<std::endl;
00740         }
00741 
00742         //************************************1, r = 0******************************
00743         //calculate the distance between two straight lines
00744         if ( B_amplitude == 0 || pT == 0 ){
00745                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00746                         std::cout<<"  => r_helix = 0"<<std::endl;
00747                 }
00748                 G4ThreeVector mom_direction = pointIn_mom.unit();
00749                 if (mom_direction.mag()==0){
00750                         std::cout<<"WARNING!!! In CdcSD::FindClosestPoint(), momentum is zero!"<<std::endl;
00751                         return 1;
00752                 }
00753                 G4double theta = mom_direction.theta(wire_direction); // angle between momentum and wire
00754                 if (theta == 0){ // momentum parallels with wire, then no need to go on
00755                         closestPoint_pos = pointIn_pos;
00756                         driftD = DpI;
00757                         return 0;
00758                 }
00759                 G4double d = (mom_direction.cross(wire_direction)).dot(w2PI); // distance from wire to (whole) track
00760                 G4double l = sqrt(DpI*DpI-d*d)/cos(theta);
00761                 G4ThreeVector point1 = pointIn_pos + l*mom_direction;
00762                 G4ThreeVector point2 = pointIn_pos - l*mom_direction;
00763                 G4ThreeVector w2P1 = point1 - wire_pos;
00764                 G4ThreeVector w2P2 = point2 - wire_pos;
00765                 G4double D1 = (w2P1 - w2P1.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction ).mag();
00766                 G4double D2 = (w2P2 - w2P2.dot(wire_direction)*wire_direction ).mag();
00767                 driftD = d;
00768                 closestPoint_pos = (D1 < D2 ? point1 : point2);
00769                 G4double h2PI = ( pointIn_pos - closestPoint_pos ).mag();
00770                 G4double h2PO = ( pointOut_pos - closestPoint_pos ).mag();
00771                 G4double pI2PO = ( pointOut_pos - pointIn_pos ).mag();
00772                 if ( h2PO > pI2PO || h2PI > pI2PO ){
00773                         if ( h2PO > h2PI ){
00774                                 closestPoint_pos = pointIn_pos;
00775                                 driftD = DpI;
00776                         }
00777                         else{
00778                                 closestPoint_pos = pointOut_pos;
00779                                 driftD = DpO;
00780                         }
00781                 }
00782         }
00783         //***********************2, r = !0 && B_direction parallels wire******************************
00784         else if ( B_direction.isParallel(wire_direction, fTolerance) ){
00785                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00786                         std::cout<<"  => B_direction parallels wire"<<std::endl;
00787                 }
00788                 //rotate z to wire direction
00789                 G4double theta4rotate = wire_direction.theta();
00790                 G4ThreeVector axis4rotate = (wire_direction.cross(G4ThreeVector(0,0,1))).unit();
00791                 if (axis4rotate.mag() == 0){
00792                         axis4rotate = G4ThreeVector(0., 0., 1.);
00793                 }
00794                 B_direction.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00795                 wire_pos.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00796                 pointIn_pos.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00797                 pointOut_pos.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00798                 pointIn_mom.rotate(axis4rotate, theta4rotate);
00799                 //now wire_pos is the position of the projection of pointIn on the wire
00800                 wire_pos.setZ(pointIn_pos.z());
00801 
00802                 //pIC_D means the vector from pointIn to the centre of the curvature; z=0!!!
00803                 //pOC_D means the vector from pointOut to the centre of the curvature; z!=0!!!
00804                 G4ThreeVector pT_vec = pointIn_mom.cross(B_direction);
00805                 pT_vec.setMag(pT);
00806                 G4ThreeVector pIC_D = (pT_vec/eV) / (B_amplitude/tesla) / charge / (c_light/(m/s)) * m;
00807                 G4ThreeVector pOC_D = ( pointIn_pos + pIC_D ) - pointOut_pos;
00808 
00809                 //wC_D means the vector from wire_pos to centre of the curvature
00810                 G4ThreeVector wC_D = ( pointIn_pos + pIC_D ) - wire_pos;
00811                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00812                         std::cout<<"    [X(rho/cm,phi/deg,z/cm)]: pIC_D("<<pIC_D.rho()/cm
00813                                 <<","<<pIC_D.phi()/deg
00814                                 <<","<<pIC_D.z()/cm
00815                                 <<"), pOC_D("<<pOC_D.rho()/cm
00816                                 <<","<<pOC_D.phi()/deg
00817                                 <<","<<pOC_D.z()/cm
00818                                 <<"), wC_D("<<wC_D.rho()/cm
00819                                 <<","<<wC_D.phi()/deg
00820                                 <<","<<wC_D.z()/cm
00821                                 <<")"
00822                                 <<std::endl;
00823                 }
00824 
00825                 //how much phi has the partical traveled within this step.
00826                 G4double traveled_dphi; 
00827                 if ( pointIn_mom.z() != 0 ){
00828                         traveled_dphi = fabs(((pOC_D.z() - pIC_D.z())/m) * (B_amplitude/tesla) * charge * (c_light/(m/s)) / (pointIn_mom.z()/eV) * rad);
00829                 }
00830                 else{
00831                         traveled_dphi = 720 * deg;
00832                 }
00833 
00834                 //toTravel_dphi indicates how much phi distance(in intrinsic cylindrical coordinate system) does the partical have to travel to reach the closest point w.r.t wire.
00835                 //toTravel_derection indicates whether the partical has to travel more than 180 deg or not
00836                 G4double toTravel_dphi;
00837                 G4double theta_pIHit = wC_D.theta(pIC_D);// 0~180 degree
00838                 G4double theta_pOHit = wC_D.theta(pOC_D.perpPart());// 0~180 degree
00839                 G4double toTravel_derection = (pointIn_mom.cross(pIC_D)).z() * (pIC_D.cross(wC_D)).z();//+: 0~180; -: 180~360
00840                 if ( toTravel_derection < 0 ) toTravel_dphi = 360 * deg - theta_pIHit;
00841                 else toTravel_dphi = theta_pIHit;
00842                 G4double toTravel_dz = toTravel_dphi/rad * (pointIn_mom.z()/eV) / (B_amplitude/tesla) / fabs(charge) / (c_light/(m/s)) * m;
00843 
00844                 //if toTravel_dphi >= traveled_dphi, then the pointOut or pointIn will be considered as the closest point, ie hit point.
00845                 int hit_type = 0;
00846                 if ( toTravel_dphi > traveled_dphi ){
00847                         if ( theta_pIHit < theta_pOHit ){
00848                                 closestPoint_pos = pointIn_pos;
00849                                 hit_type = 1;
00850                         }
00851                         else{
00852                                 closestPoint_pos = pointOut_pos;
00853                                 hit_type = 2;
00854                         }
00855                 }
00856                 else{
00857                         closestPoint_pos = pointIn_pos;
00858                         G4ThreeVector pHC_D = pIC_D;
00859                         pHC_D.setPhi(wC_D.phi());
00860                         closestPoint_pos += ( pIC_D - pHC_D );
00861                         closestPoint_pos.setZ( pointIn_pos.z() + toTravel_dz );
00862                 }
00863                 driftD = (closestPoint_pos - wire_pos).perp();
00864                 // rotate back to lab coordinates
00865                 closestPoint_pos.rotate( axis4rotate, -theta4rotate );
00866                 //driftD = pIC_D.mag() - wC_D.mag();
00867 
00868                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00869                         std::cout<<"    traveled_dphi = "<<traveled_dphi/deg
00870                                 <<"deg, toTravel_dphi = "<<toTravel_dphi/deg
00871                                 <<"deg, theta_pIHit = "<<theta_pIHit/deg
00872                                 <<"deg, theta_pOHit = "<<theta_pOHit/deg
00873                                 <<"deg, type: "<<hit_type
00874                                 <<std::endl;
00875                 }
00876         }
00877         //***********************3, r = !0 && B_direction does not parallel wire******************************
00878         else{
00879                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00880                         std::cout<<"  => B_direction does not parallel wire"<<std::endl;
00881                 }
00882                 G4ThreeVector x_axis(1.,0.,0.),y_axis(0.,1.,0.),z_axis(0.,0.,1.);
00883 
00884                 //=>Step 1, Calculate helix parameters
00885                 //rotate z to B direction
00886                 G4double theta4rotate_B = B_direction.theta();
00887                 G4ThreeVector axis4rotate_B = (B_direction.cross(G4ThreeVector(0,0,1))).unit();
00888                 if (axis4rotate_B.mag() == 0){
00889                         axis4rotate_B = G4ThreeVector(0., 0., 1.);
00890                 }
00891                 G4ThreeVector pointIn_pos_B = pointIn_pos;
00892                 G4ThreeVector pointOut_pos_B = pointOut_pos;
00893                 G4ThreeVector pointIn_mom_B = pointIn_mom;
00894                 pointIn_pos_B.rotate(axis4rotate_B, theta4rotate_B);
00895                 pointOut_pos_B.rotate(axis4rotate_B, theta4rotate_B);
00896                 pointIn_mom_B.rotate(axis4rotate_B, theta4rotate_B);
00897                 //calculate l_helix
00898                 //  l_helix>0: right hand helix; l_helix<0: left hand helix;
00899                 G4double l_helix = - (pointIn_mom_B.z()/eV) / (c_light/(m/s)) / charge / (B_amplitude/tesla) * m;
00900                 //calculate traveled_dphi( with sign )
00901                 G4double traveled_dphi;
00902                 if ( l_helix != 0 ){
00903                         traveled_dphi = ( pointOut_pos_B.z() - pointIn_pos_B.z() ) / l_helix;
00904                 }
00905                 else {
00906                         traveled_dphi = 720 * deg;
00907                 }
00908                 //calculate r_helix( positive )
00909                 G4double r_helix = fabs( (pT/eV) / (c_light/(m/s)) / charge / (B_amplitude/tesla) ) * m;
00910 
00911                 //=>Step 2, rotate z to wire direction, y to Bxy direction and move (x=0,y=0) to wire
00912                 G4double theta4rotate_z = wire_direction.theta();
00913                 G4ThreeVector axis4rotate_z = (wire_direction.cross(G4ThreeVector(0,0,1))).unit();
00914                 if (axis4rotate_z.mag() == 0){
00915                         axis4rotate_z = G4ThreeVector(0., 0., 1.);
00916                 }
00917                 B_direction.rotate(axis4rotate_z, theta4rotate_z);
00918                 wire_pos.rotate(axis4rotate_z, theta4rotate_z);
00919                 pointIn_pos.rotate(axis4rotate_z, theta4rotate_z);
00920                 pointIn_mom.rotate(axis4rotate_z, theta4rotate_z);
00921 
00922                 G4double theta4rotate_y = 90.*deg - B_direction.phi();
00923                 B_direction.rotate(z_axis, theta4rotate_y);
00924                 wire_pos.rotate(z_axis, theta4rotate_y);
00925                 pointIn_pos.rotate(z_axis, theta4rotate_y);
00926                 pointIn_mom.rotate(z_axis, theta4rotate_y);
00927 
00928                 G4ThreeVector vec4move(wire_pos.x(),wire_pos.y(),0.);
00929                 pointIn_pos -= vec4move;
00930 
00931                 //=>Step 3, get parameters of initial state and final state
00932                 G4double theta_helix = B_direction.theta();
00933                 G4ThreeVector pT_vec = pointIn_mom.cross(B_direction);
00934                 pT_vec.setMag(pT);
00935                 G4ThreeVector cPI_D = - (pT_vec/eV) / (B_amplitude/tesla) / charge / (c_light/(m/s)) * m;
00936                 G4double phi_in = ( cPI_D.rotate(x_axis, theta_helix) ).phi();
00937                 G4double phi_out = phi_in + traveled_dphi;
00938 
00939                 //=>Step 4, get parameters of the function for distance
00940                 //d(D^2/r^2)/d(phi)) = a[0] + a[1]*sin(2*phi) + a[2]*sin(phi) + a[3]*cos(phi) + a[4]*phi*cos(phi) + a[5]*phi
00941                 G4double x0 = pointIn_pos.x()/r_helix;
00942                 G4double y0 = pointIn_pos.y()/r_helix;
00943                 G4double z0 = pointIn_pos.z()/r_helix;
00944                 G4double k = l_helix/r_helix;
00945                 G4double cosPhi = cos(phi_in);
00946                 G4double sinPhi = sin(phi_in);
00947                 G4double sinTheta = sin(theta_helix);
00948                 G4double cosTheta = cos(theta_helix);
00949                 G4double A = x0- cosPhi;
00950                 G4double B = y0- sinPhi*cosTheta - k*phi_in*sinTheta;
00951                 G4double a[6];
00952                 a[0] = B*k*sinTheta;
00953                 a[1] = -sinTheta*sinTheta/2;
00954                 a[2] = k*sinTheta*cosTheta-A;
00955                 a[3] = B;
00956                 a[4] = k*sinTheta*cosTheta;
00957                 a[5] = k*k*sinTheta*sinTheta;
00958                 G4double phi_left, phi_right;
00959                 if ( traveled_dphi > 0 ){
00960                         phi_left = phi_in;
00961                         phi_right = phi_out;
00962                 }
00963                 else{
00964                         phi_left = phi_out;
00965                         phi_right = phi_in;
00966                 }
00967 
00968                 //=>Step 5, find phi
00969                 //About type:
00970                 //0: f'>=0 && f''<0;
00971                 //1: f'<0 && f''<=0;
00972                 //2: f'<0 && f''>=0;
00973                 //3: f'>=0 && f''>0;
00975                 //ATTENTION!!! This method will fail if there are more than 4 segments(devided according to types) in this step
00976                 int type_left = check_type(a,phi_left);
00977                 int type_right = check_type(a,phi_right);
00978                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00979                         std::cout<<"    type_left = "<<type_left<<", type_right == "<<type_right<<std::endl;
00980                 }
00981                 G4int nTry_max = 100;
00982                 double error = 0;
00983                 G4double root_left = NewtonRootFinding(a,phi_left,nTry_max,fTolerance,error);
00984                 if (error_max<fabs(error)) error_max = fabs(error);
00985                 G4double root_right = NewtonRootFinding(a,phi_right,nTry_max,fTolerance,error);
00986                 if (error_max<fabs(error)) error_max = fabs(error);
00987                 G4double b[4];
00988                 b[0] = theta_helix;
00989                 b[1] = k;
00990                 b[2] = A;
00991                 b[3] = B;
00992                 G4double dist2_left = calculateDist2(b,phi_left);
00993                 G4double dist2_right = calculateDist2(b,phi_right);
00994                 G4double phi;
00995                 if ( (type_left == type_right && type_right <= 1 && root_left != root_right) || (type_left == 1 && type_right == 0) ){
00996                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00997                                 std::cout<<"    =>Need to find minimum value"<<std::endl;
00998                         }
00999                         //half finding
01000                         G4double left = root_left;
01001                         G4double right = root_right;
01002                         G4double mid;
01003                         int iTry = 0;
01004                         while (1){
01005                                 mid = ( left + right )/2;
01006                                 int type = check_type(a,mid);
01007                                 if ( type == 1 || type == 2 ) break;
01008                                 else if (type == 0) right = mid;
01009                                 else left = mid;
01010                                 if ( iTry++ >= nTry_max ){
01011                                         //std::cout<<"WARNING: in CdcSD::FindClosestPoint(), iTry reached maximum limit "<<iTry<<std::endl;
01012                                         break;
01013                                 }
01014                         }
01015                         if (nTry<iTry) nTry = iTry;
01016                         G4double root_mid = NewtonRootFinding(a,mid,nTry_max,fTolerance,error);
01017                         if (error_max<fabs(error)) error_max = fabs(error);
01018                         G4double dist2_root = calculateDist2(b,root_mid);
01019                         int index = findSmallest(dist2_left, dist2_right, dist2_root);
01020                         if ( index == 0 ) phi = phi_left;
01021                         else if ( index == 1 ) phi = phi_right;
01022                         else phi = root_mid;
01023                 }
01024                 else if( (type_left <= 2 && type_right == 3) ||
01025                                 (type_left == type_right && type_right == 2 && root_left != root_right) ||
01026                                 (type_left == type_right && type_right == 3 && root_left != root_right) ||
01027                                 (type_left == 2 && type_right <= 1) ){
01028                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
01029                                 std::cout<<"    =>Got minimum value"<<std::endl;
01030                         }
01031                         G4double dist2_root = calculateDist2(b,root_right);
01032                         int index = findSmallest(dist2_left, dist2_right, dist2_root);
01033                         if ( index == 0 ) phi = phi_left;
01034                         else if ( index == 1 ) phi = phi_right;
01035                         else phi = root_right;
01036                 }
01037                 else {
01038                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
01039                                 std::cout<<"    =>Don't need minimum value"<<std::endl;
01040                         }
01041                         phi = (dist2_left < dist2_right ? phi_left : phi_right);
01042                 }
01043 
01044                 //=>Step 6, get the point
01045                 G4double X = r_helix * ( cos(phi) + A );
01046                 G4double Y = r_helix * ( sin(phi)*cosTheta + k*phi*sinTheta + B );
01047                 G4double Z = r_helix * ( k*phi*cosTheta - sin(phi)*sinTheta - k*phi_in*cosTheta + z0 + sinPhi*sinTheta );
01048                 closestPoint_pos.setX(X);
01049                 closestPoint_pos.setY(Y);
01050                 closestPoint_pos.setZ(Z);
01051 
01052                 //=>Step 7, transform it back to lab coordinate system
01053                 driftD = closestPoint_pos.rho();
01054                 closestPoint_pos += vec4move;
01055                 closestPoint_pos.rotate(z_axis, -theta4rotate_y);
01056                 closestPoint_pos.rotate(axis4rotate_z, -theta4rotate_z);
01057 
01058                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
01059                         std::cout<<"    traveled_dphi = "<<traveled_dphi/deg
01060                                 <<"deg, phi_in = "<<phi_in/deg
01061                                 <<"deg, phi_out = "<<phi_out/deg
01062                                 <<"deg, phi = "<<phi/deg
01063                                 <<"deg"<<std::endl;
01064                 }
01065         }
01066         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
01067                 std::cout<<"  closestPoint_pos(rho,phi,z):"<<closestPoint_pos.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<closestPoint_pos.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<closestPoint_pos.z()/cm<<"cm, driftD = "<<driftD/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
01068         }
01069         return 0;
01070 }
01071 int CdcSD::check_type(G4double a[6], G4double phi){
01072         //0: f'>=0 && f''<0;
01073         //1: f'<0 && f''<=0;
01074         //2: f'<0 && f''>=0;
01075         //3: f'>=0 && f''>0;
01076         //d(D^2/r^2)/d(phi)) = a[0] + a[1]*sin(2*phi) + a[2]*sin(phi) + a[3]*cos(phi) + a[4]*phi*cos(phi) + a[5]*phi
01077         //dd(D^2/r^2)/dd(phi)) = 2*a[1]*cos(2*phi) + (a[2]+a[4])*cos(phi) - a[3]*sin(phi) - a[4]*phi*sin(phi) + a[5]
01078         G4double f1 = a[0] + a[1]*sin(2*phi) + a[2]*sin(phi) + a[3]*cos(phi) + a[4]*phi*cos(phi) + a[5]*phi;
01079         G4double f2 = 2*a[1]*cos(2*phi) + (a[2]+a[4])*cos(phi) - a[3]*sin(phi) - a[4]*phi*sin(phi) + a[5];
01080         int type;
01081         if (f1>=0 && f2<0) type = 0;
01082         else if (f1<0 && f2<=0) type = 1;
01083         else if (f1<0 && f2>=0) type = 2;
01084         else if (f1>=0 && f2>0) type = 3;
01085         return type;
01086 }
01087 double CdcSD::NewtonRootFinding(G4double a[6], G4double phi, G4int nTry_max, G4double torl, G4double &error){
01088         G4double delta = 10e10;
01089         G4int iTry = 0;
01090         while( fabs(delta) > torl ){
01091                 iTry++;
01092                 if( iTry > nTry_max ){
01093                         //std::cout<<"WARNING: in CdcSD::NewtonRootFinding(), iTry reached maximum limit "<<iTry<<std::endl;
01094                         break;
01095                 }
01096                 //d(D^2/r^2)/d(phi)) = a[0] + a[1]*sin(2*phi) + a[2]*sin(phi) + a[3]*cos(phi) + a[4]*phi*cos(phi) + a[5]*phi
01097                 //dd(D^2/r^2)/dd(phi)) = 2*a[1]*cos(2*phi) + (a[2]+a[4])*cos(phi) - a[3]*sin(phi) - a[4]*phi*sin(phi) + a[5]
01098                 delta = a[0] + a[1]*sin(2*phi) + a[2]*sin(phi) + a[3]*cos(phi) + a[4]*phi*cos(phi) + a[5]*phi;
01099                 G4double k = 2*a[1]*cos(2*phi) + (a[2]+a[4])*cos(phi) - a[3]*sin(phi) - a[4]*phi*sin(phi) + a[5];
01100                 if ( k == 0 ){
01101                         //std::cout<<"WARNING: in CdcSD::NewtonRootFinding(), k = 0!!!"<<std::endl;
01102                         phi += pi/50;
01103                 }
01104                 else phi -= delta/k;
01105         }
01106         error = delta;
01107         return phi;
01108 }
01109 double CdcSD::calculateDist2(G4double b[4], G4double phi){
01110         //b[0] = theta_helix;
01111         //b[1] = k;
01112         //b[2] = A;
01113         //b[3] = B;
01114         G4double dx = cos(phi)+b[2];
01115         G4double dy = sin(phi)*cos(b[0])+b[1]*phi*sin(b[0])+b[3];
01116         G4double dist2 = dx*dx + dy*dy;
01117         return dist2;
01118 }
01119 int CdcSD::findSmallest( double a, double b, double c){
01120         if ( a < b ){
01121                 if ( a < c ) return 0;
01122                 else return 2;
01123         }
01124         else if ( b<c ) return 1;
01125         else return 2;
01126 }
